actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey lands acquired for the Candy Lake project, Osage County, Oklahoma.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey lands previously acquired by the United States for the Candy Lake project in Osage County, Oklahoma. Directs the Secretary to give first right of purchase to previous owners of such land. Provides for: (1) notification to previous owners; and (2) sale by public auction of land not otherwise purchased.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey lands acquired for the Candy Lake project, Osage County, Oklahoma.
